revised_title: Metathesis Reactions of the Ethyl Radical with Unsaturated Hydrocarbons
tldr: This study investigates the metathetical reactions of the ethyl radical with unsaturated hydrocarbons. The kinetic study shows a natural correspondence between molecular structure and reactivity. The results demonstrate how the rate of abstraction of a constituent hydrogen atom from the hydrocarbon is influenced by bond multiplicity and molecular structure.
